IntroSong.Intro: For your eyes only, can see me through the night For your eyes only, I never need to hide
IntroSong.PreChorus: You can see so much in me So much in me that's new I never felt, until I looked at you
IntroSong.Chorus: For your eyes only, only for you You see what no one else can see Now I'm breaking free For your eyes only, only for you The love I know you need in me The fantasy you freed in me Only for you, only for you
IntroSong.Intro: For your eyes only, the nights are never cold You really know me, that's all I need to know
IntroSong.PreChorus: Maybe I'm an open book Because I know you're mine But you won't need to read between the lines
IntroSong.Chorus: For your eyes only, only for you You see what no one else can see Now I'm breaking free For your eyes only, only for you The passions that collide in me The wild abandoned side of me Only for you, for your eyes only
